item.description: 10:00 AM.. LET US PRAY FOR A HOT DAY... BRING YOUR POTLUCK DISH: LIKE POTATO SALAD, TOSS SALAD WITH DRESSINGS, EGG SALAD, MACRONI SALAD, CHICKEN SALAD, PICKLES AND CHIPS, DESSERT.. ANY KIND OF DISH FOR A PICNIC TO GO WITH HOT DOGS ALSO SOY HOT DOGS FOR THOSE WHO DO NOT EAT MEET, IS WHAT I WILL BRING ,ALONG WITH SILVERWARE, PLATES, NAPKINS, AND MUSTARD , KETCUP AND RELISH.. ONIONS TOO.... iF HOT DOGS ARE NOT YOUR MEAT OF CHOICE BRING YOUR OWN.. AND I WILL HAVE THE CHARCOAL GOING FOR ANYONE... BYOB DON'T FORGET YOUR KAYAK, SWIM WEAR, LIFE JACKET, SUNSCREEN, TOWEL.. AND HAT.. LEAVE YOUR IPHONE AND GLASSES AT HOME!!! PLEASE LET ME KNOW WHAT YOU ARE BRINGING SO THAT WE DON'T HAVE LOTS OF DUPLICATES.... THINK OF SOME CHALLENGES TO DO ON THE WATER... WITH OUR KAYAKS.... PUT YOUR THINKING CAPS ON....

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: POTLUCK PICNIC,SWIM, KAYAK ADVENTURE AT HARTLAND DAM
